mapper.select: SELECT videos.vdoID, users.userNo, vdoPath, vdoImg, vdoNa, vdoRemark, likeNum, dislikeNum, watchNum, videos.createTime, userNa, userImg, isPublic from userislike LEFT JOIN videos LEFT JOIN users ON videos.userNo=users.userNo ON userislike.vdoId = videos.vdoId WHERE userislike.userNo=#{userNo} AND isLike=1

SELECT videos.vdoID, users.userNo, vdoPath, vdoImg, vdoNa, vdoRemark, likeNum, dislikeNum, watchNum, videos.createTime, userNa, userImg, isPublic from videos LEFT JOIN users ON videos.userNo=users.userNo WHERE vdoRemark like '%'+#{userNo}+'%' AND (vdoType=#{vdoType} OR #{vdoType}='')
